name: Lethal Loop
description:
An entry for Ludum Dare 47 finished in 48 hours.

Introduction

Lethal Loop is an action game happening in the cyberspace. You will control a guardian robot eliminating viruses invading the server. However, the robot's combat system has been infected by viruses. As a result, all the available actions are locked in a dead loop.

In other words, during the combat, you cannot execute whatever commands you like. Instead, all the available commands must be executed in a fixed sequence, over and over again. Use Mouse to aim. Use Left Click and Right Click to execute the first and the second available commands.
